summary: The implementation successfully delivers a complete interactive Dutch retention script navigator with hierarchical navigation (up to 4 levels), breadcrumb system, and visually distinct script sections. All 15 requirements appear to be implemented with full script content in Dutch, clickable navigation, and professional design optimized for call center use.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication integration (useInternetIdentity hook, InternetIdentityProvider, AuthClient)
hallucinated_features.reason: Authentication was explicitly listed as a non-goal: 'User authentication or agent accounts' should not be included

hallucinated_features.description: Backend actor integration with ICP canister system
hallucinated_features.reason: No backend functionality was requested. The script is static data that should be client-side only. Backend/actor infrastructure appears unnecessary for the stated requirements

hallucinated_features.description: React Query (TanStack Query) integration for data fetching
hallucinated_features.reason: No data fetching requirements exist. All script content is static and provided in the build request. QueryClient and related infrastructure appears over-engineered for static content display
